name: 行銷研究
description: The purpose of this course is to provide you with a basic understanding of “marketing research.” Marketing research involves developing research questions, collecting data, analyzing it and drawing inferences, with a view to making better business decisions. Thus, the primary emphasis will be on designing tools and developing skills that are necessary for analysis in marketing decision making.
goals: understand the value of decision making involving marketing research
know basic tools and applications of market research.
be able to structure marketing problems in a way amenable to research.
apply various concepts and analytical tools when formulating marketing strategies.
5	exhibit depth of thinking with which students can identify problems and solutions within the contexts of marketing.
syllabus:
本課程旨在介紹行銷研究的基礎理論與在管理實務上之應用，行銷研究利用研究問題建立、資料蒐集、分析與推論來協助經營者做出較佳之決策。因此，主要聚焦在研究設計工具與能力之培養。
